name: Pet Zombies
description:
Pet Zombies for Nintendo 3DS lets you reanimate your very own customizable zombies that you can play with, care for, or torment in a variety of environments where they can shamble, shuffle and lurch. Bond with your zombie by providing it food, toys and interaction, but be careful; if you neglect your zombie, you may find yourself minus a finger, or...a brain!

Features

• Nurture your zombie with severed arm chew toys, brains-in-a-ball, and more!
• Punish your zombie with torches, shock collars, and more!
• Play games with your pet to buy fun new items in the shop.
